translations: 女裁缝师；女装设计师；时髦女服商店

sentences.sentence: Though of course my Jane needs little help from couturiers .
sentences.translation: 当然，我家简几乎不需要什么打扮。

sentences.sentence: The Paris couturiers showed their collections for winter last week.
sentences.translation: 上周，巴黎的时装设计师们展示了他们的冬季时装作品。

sentences.sentence: There are only two questions anyone is asking Paris couturiers this season: "What are your inspirations?"
sentences.translation: 本季巴黎高级定制时装周上，设计师们总会被问以下两个问题:“你的灵感来自哪里?”
